duties_responsibilities.duty: Coordinate and manage day-to-day activities of the commissions team, including monitoring workloads and ensuring compliance and standards are met.
Recommend and administer commission policies, processes, and practices for all company product lines and distributions.
Oversee field compensation administration, escalations, and difficult cases/issues, ensuring a servicing philosophy approach to sales force customer relations.
Supervise direct reports, oversee workflow, communicate company goals and policies, provide feedback, foster a positive work environment, and promote employee development.
Responsible for training, hiring, and performance management of the team.
Coordinate legal and compliance requests, establish control methods to maintain compliance with state and federal regulations, and review statistical data to validate accuracy of agent payments.
Participate in the design and development of agent compensation contracts, manage vendor relationships, and support a diverse and inclusive culture.
Manage all aspects of assigned projects to execute commission and department initiatives, evaluate potential system enhancement/change requests, and embrace the company's culture of betterment.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in business analytics, computer science, management information systems, information technology, or related field. Combination of education and/or relevant work experience may be accepted in lieu of degree.
